thread.title: BRIEF-Deutsche Bank Sets Threshold Price And Initial Price For Cash-Settled Equity Linked Notes

title: BRIEF-Deutsche Bank Sets Threshold Price And Initial Price For Cash-Settled Equity Linked Notes

organizations.name: cash-settled equity linked notes reuters staff

text:
April 20, 2018 / 11:33 AM / in 6 minutes BRIEF-Deutsche Bank Sets Threshold Price And Initial Price For Cash-Settled Equity Linked Notes Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 20 (Reuters) - Deutsche Bank AG: 
* ANNOUNCES THRESHOLD PRICE AND INITIAL PRICE FOR CASH-SETTLED EQUITY LINKED NOTES LINKED TO THE COMMON STOCK OF JPMORGAN CHASE & CO. DUE MAY 1, 2023 * THRESHOLD PRICE OF NOTES HAS BEEN SET AT $128.73460 
* PRICE REPRESENTS 16% PREMIUM OVER INITIAL PRICE OF $110.9781 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
